thread.title: Birch Travels to Boston for Cloud Partners 2015
thread.title_full: Birch Travels to Boston for Cloud Partners 2015

author: admin
title: Birch Travels to Boston for Cloud Partners 2015
text:
Birch Communications, Inc. 
ATLANTA, Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Birch Communications, Inc., ("Birch") a leading nationwide provider of communications, network and cloud services to small, mid-sized, enterprise and wholesale businesses announced today that it will participate in Cloud Partners 2015, September 16 - 18, 2015, at the Hynes Convention Center in Boston. Birch will be advising on its cloud strategy best practices as well as providing valuable information about the Birch partner program at booth #720 . 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20110606/CG14010LOGO 
The Cloud Partners trade show highlights the latest cloud solutions and provides the opportunity to learn to become more experienced, knowledgeable and successful cloud enablers from the most influential industry experts. Cloud Partners 2015 will highlight its "scale, impact and action" theme by examining how to enable scale, impact and action based on the cloud services that each cloud practice delivers. 
"We are dedicated to building partner relationships that enable the channel to thrive in the marketplace. We plan to interact with other channel leaders to pursue strategic initiatives that help partners fuel their channel sales by moving their customers to the cloud," said Brad Smith, Vice President of National Partner Development. "Birch has over 1,100 direct partners, through which it reaches more than 8,000 sub-agents. Birch is known for its outstanding partner compensation plans, which include upfront, residual, and bonus components." 
"The company has strategically broadened its product portfolio and geographic footprint, increasing partners' ability to sell in new markets and generate greater service revenues," said Jeff Heyd, Regional Channel Manager, Birch. "Shows like Cloud Partners allow us to really showcase the vast number of products in our portfolio, including TotalCloud® PBX, TotalCloud® File Storage, TotalCloud® Data Center, a full array of dedicated access choices, and wireline services. I can't wait to meet with new and current partners and share the breadth of services Birch can offer their customers." 
To learn more about cloud services and channel sales, schedule a meeting with a member of the Birch team by contacting Brad Smith at brad.smith@birch.com . For the latest Cloud Partners news, updates and information follow the event on Twitter at @BirchComm . 
About Birch Communications 
Birch Communications, Inc. is a leading communications, network, cloud and IT solutions provider. Recognized for exceptional customer experience, Birch delivers cost-effective solutions that assist small, mid-sized, enterprise and wholesale businesses to increase their productivity. Its industry-leading product portfolio is available nationwide and includes Metro-Fiber, Metro-Ethernet, unified communications (UC), hosted phone systems, hosted data centers, and hosted file storage services. For more information, visit birch.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/birch-travels-to-boston-for-cloud-partners-2015-300144198.html 
SOURCE Birch Communications, Inc.
